title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 148.11 - Agency performance evaluation plans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 148.11 - Agency performance evaluation plans

State Regulations

Upon the request of the Director of the Budget, each agency
shall submit a plan, developed in accordance with such guidelines as may be
issued for such purposes, which at a minimum sets forth the agency's projected
rating plan and anticipated expenditures for advancement and award payments for
the ensuing fiscal year or other appropriate reporting
period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
148.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
